Question & Options:
Which relationships are depicted in the interactions between Alvey, Tim, and Moss?
Options:
A. Alvey torments Tim using his powers.
B. Tim fails to impress his boss Moss.
C. Tim is Alvey's son.
D. All of the above

Which of the following statements is true regarding the characters Alvey and Tim in relation to the Mask?
Options:
A. a) Alvey uses his powers to torment Tim.
B. b) Tim becomes the Mask to confront Loki.
C. c) Alvey is Tim's father.
D. d) Tim works from home while dealing with Alvey.
Correct Answer: a) Alvey uses his powers to torment Tim, b) Tim becomes the Mask to confront Loki, c) Alvey is Tim's father.
